column1: MRI image size (256, 256, 1) of a human head of a man of 37 years old in weighting T2, with coronal section. We carefully examine slice n°42 from the back of the skull. The section reveals the presence of: the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 2551.0254 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 4164.6973 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 192.4805 mm³, the white matter of left hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 594.5801 mm³, the left cerebellar cortex of volume 2413.9160 mm³, the fourth ventricle of volume 59.3262 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 2510.1562 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 4090.8691 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 214.8926 mm³, the white matter of right hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 609.0820 mm³ and the right cerebellar cortex of volume 2295.2637 mm³.

MRI size (256, 256, 1) in weighting T2, presenting the head of a man of 37 years old, of coronal section. The observation is made on slice n°42 from the back of the skull.
